note.p: Daughter of Alexander John Scott, dissident preacher, and his wife Ann Ker. Susan and her mother were with Annie Darwin during her last illness at Malvern in 1851. Lived in London, 1881; in Manchester with her aunt, Sarah Lucas, 1891.
Census returns of England and Wales 1881 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG11/182/61/11), 1891 (RG12/3199/104/7)
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1966, 1973–95 (Ancestry.co.uk, accessed 17 September 2018)
letter from Emma Darwin to Anne Elizabeth Darwin, [4 or 11 April 1851] (DAR 210.13: 4)
